long_description: The GoPro Chest Mount harness makes it easy to capture immersive video and photos from a lower-than-the-helmet point of view. It's ideal for skiing, mountain biking and paddling. Footage filmed from the chest captures more of your arms and legs in action than footage filmed from a helmet. Adjustable chest harness is made of durable nylon webbing with polycarbonate and stainless-steel hardware. Includes a vertical surface "J-hook" buckle. The GoPro Chest Mount harness is compatible with all GoPro quick-release cameras; not compatible with the GoPro Digital Hero 5 wrist camera.
short_description: The GoPro Chest Mount harness makes it easy to capture immersive video and photos from a lower-than-the-helmet point of view. It's ideal for skiing, mountain biking and paddling.
